name: tenantRelationships_managedTenants_UpdateWindowsProtectionStates
description: Update the navigation property windowsProtectionStates in tenantRelationships

$ul: **@odata.type**
**id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**antiMalwareVersion**: The anti-malware version for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**attentionRequired**: A flag indicating whether attention is required for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**deviceDeleted**: A flag indicating whether the managed device has been deleted. Optional. Read-only.
**devicePropertyRefreshDateTime**: The date and time the device property has been refreshed. Optional. Read-only.
**engineVersion**: The anti-virus engine version for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**fullScanOverdue**: A flag indicating whether quick scan is overdue for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**fullScanRequired**: A flag indicating whether full scan is overdue for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**lastFullScanDateTime**: The date and time a full scan was completed. Optional. Read-only.
**lastFullScanSignatureVersion**: The version anti-malware version used to perform the last full scan. Optional. Read-only.
**lastQuickScanDateTime**: The date and time a quick scan was completed. Optional. Read-only.
**lastQuickScanSignatureVersion**: The version anti-malware version used to perform the last full scan. Optional. Read-only.
**lastRefreshedDateTime**: Date and time the entity was last updated in the multi-tenant management platform. Optional. Read-only.
**lastReportedDateTime**: The date and time the protection state was last reported for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**malwareProtectionEnabled**: A flag indicating whether malware protection is enabled for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**managedDeviceHealthState**: The health state for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**managedDeviceId**: The unique identifier for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**managedDeviceName**: The display name for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**networkInspectionSystemEnabled**: A flag indicating whether the network inspection system is enabled. Optional. Read-only.
**quickScanOverdue**: A flag indicating weather a quick scan is overdue. Optional. Read-only.
**realTimeProtectionEnabled**: A flag indicating whether real time protection is enabled. Optional. Read-only.
**rebootRequired**: A flag indicating whether a reboot is required. Optional. Read-only.
**signatureUpdateOverdue**: A flag indicating whether an signature update is overdue. Optional. Read-only.
**signatureVersion**: The signature version for the managed device. Optional. Read-only.
**tenantDisplayName**: The display name for the managed tenant. Optional. Read-only.
**tenantId**: The Azure Active Directory tenant identifier for the managed tenant. Optional. Read-only.
